about.name: Gabriel Lucic
about.intro: Hi, I’m Gabriel Lucic – a Software Developer based in Munich, Germany. I’ve spent the past 7+ years building and maintaining backend systems, mostly using PHP and Laravel, with a focus on clean code, scalability, and long-term maintainability.
about.experience: I enjoy working in cross-functional Agile teams and have experience with tools like PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, and also some Java, Spring Boot, and AngularJS along the way.
about.goals: I’m fluent in English, German, and Croatian, and always looking to grow as a developer. My long-term goal is to take on more architectural responsibilities and help shape solid, future-proof systems.
